project_descr: The top three priorities of the Independent Directorate of Local Governance are: 1) service delivery; 2) accountability; and 3) clear functions and mandates. IDLG and UNDP will address these jointly through the LoGo project

outputs.output_descr: LOGO initiation plan is developed to finalize the Local Governance Project Afghanistan. It is a three months plan to work jointly with the IDLG to finalize the project document.
